item.description:
Join us for the one of the most anticipated fall releases!

We'll meet at 4:30pm for the 4:50 show. As always, we'll head out to a nearby watering hole afterwards.

It is recommended that you purchase your tickets in advance using this link: https://tickets.landmarktheatres.com/Ticketing.aspx?TheatreID=231&MovieID=14013&ShowDate=9/23/2012&ScheduleID=109358

 

THE MASTER

"A striking portrait of drifters and seekers in post World War II America,The Master unfolds the journey of a Navy veteran (Joaquin Phoenix) who arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future—until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader (Philip Seymour Hoffman). Written and directed by Paul Thomas Anderson (There Will Be Blood, Magnolia)."
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in theater lobby, next to the staircase.
item.name: Sunday matinee: "The Master"
